original_title: One Direction: This Is How We Do It
overview: Take a deeper look inside their fast track to stardom. From X Factor finalists to leading the resurgence of the “British Invasion”. One Direction is our generations answer to The Beatles. Interviews with the band’s managers, music industry executives and music experts along with family members and friends gives you more insight into the world of One Direction. Want to know how they did it… THIS IS HOW WE DO IT!
title: One Direction: This Is How We Do It
